Text saved: Genes are parts of our body. They decide things like our hair colour.

Scientists have questions about genes and language. Did our genes change a long time ago? Did this change help us to speak?

Scientists found a gene that changed. This happened between 100,000 and 200,000 years ago. This gene seems to help us speak. It helps our brain move our mouth and face.

Monkeys have a similar gene. But the monkey gene did not change.

We do not know everything about genes and language. It is too early to say. But maybe one day we will find the answers in our DNA.
